subject: Suits and Litigation

Age, Chronological
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Sal Marchiano, the 69-year-old longtime sportscaster, is seeking reinstatement to his former position and damages to be determined at trial.
snippet: Sal Marchiano, the 69-year-old longtime sportscaster, is seeking reinstatement to his former position and damages to be determined at trial.
